flavor_text: [i]Some question the decision to ride the blistering steed. Its rakish handlers are always quick to exchange question for question—why not?[/i]
special_text: Mount {3}{R} [i](Put this under target creature you own without a mount until it leaves the battlefield. It gains all abilities, counters, and base power and toughness from this. Mount only as a sorcery.)[/i]
